name: 普通化學實驗（二）
description: 使學生熟悉化學實驗技巧，並且與課本基本原理能互相驗證。
goals: To train students with the skills a d basic knowledge in basic chemical research.
o train stdents with the correct manners and methodology toward basic chemical reserach.
To train students to do the lab independently and collaboratively.
syllabus:
1\. experiments developed by chemistry department, including all the basic skills and methodology in the research work.  
2\. supervising with the help of a teaching assistant assigned by chemistry department.
